channel.title: davewiner tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from davewiner.

item.description: @markos That was exactly what GHW Bush did, he should have gotten the Nobel Peace prize. It didn't last, subsequent administrations really did a number on Russia, forgetting they have a vast nuclear arsenal.
@scobleizer -- I use Amazon Music. Anyway I notice they now have Dolby Atmos. I have an iPhone 13 Pro and AirPod Pro. Am I getting the full Scobleizer treatment or do I have to get Apple Music too?

Imagine a peace conference in a few weeks, with the Ukraine and Russia, the EU, NATO and of course the US. One thing the US wants is to be sure Russia stays out of our elections in the future, maybe some reparations for the damage they did in 2016. That has not been settled.
@AndreaBNYC @MaraGay Indeed. Some news org should rewrite the story of the 2016 election given all we know now about Putin and Ukraine that we didn't know then.
Write plain text files. (BTW, there is a text file format for hierarchies, called OPML.) https://t.co/rDyK8Zxd7M
Do you think Boris Johnson works for Pooootin?
Jimmy Carter says Trump only won the election because Russia 'interfered on his behalf.' https://t.co/zMAHottUrq
Don’t forget Putin interferes in our elections.
Ukrainian cyber resistance group targets Russian power grid, railways. https://t.co/dCFBuE2Pj5

Former President Trump’s top national security adviser thinks his old boss did “a lot of damage” to U.S.-Ukraine relations during his time in office—and emboldened Russian President Vladimir Putin. https://t.co/7C0GvbEYss
Cargo ship carrying Porsches, Lamborghinis, and Bentleys sinks in the Atlantic. https://t.co/xXA6hTaOUd
Ukrainian woman offers seeds to Russian soldiers so 'sunflowers grow when they die.' https://t.co/7CxnXI10Z3
Trump’s effort to rewrite history on his support of NATO and Ukraine. https://t.co/WKSFTRmwzA
Welcome to Everest 2022 Coverage. https://t.co/qwGQhHkmCZ
Drummer FAQs. https://t.co/Lv0dt67w9R

I never thought to look until just now but.. Alexa has an audio-out mini jack. I have a pair of Audioengine speakers not in use. Voila -- Amazon Music with some real sound. I'm giving it to my Peloton. BTW, did my 100th ride yesterday. You could say I'm hooked.
BTW #toolsforthought people, my OPML-based search engine, Daytona, can give me all my blocks that ref Peloton, in an outline.
https://t.co/2jFCyTZk3q
I did not have to enter [[Peloton]] to be able to access it this way. This has been a revelation.
I love it. Decades of writing available this way.
Putin's Black Sea House - Location, Video plus other houses. https://t.co/vJyRtGhYAD
@martinvars no doubt. he has no sense of humor.
Just thinking out loud, what would Putin do if Ukraine sent one of their jets to Moscow to bomb Putin's dacha.
@marshallk https://t.co/MpQUDIWt54
After Burning for Days, a Ship Carrying Thousands of Luxury Cars Sinks. https://t.co/l8JhZd2ueR
